features: 【UP-GRADE 3" FHD 1296P Dash Cam Front and Rear】This dual dash cam equipped with 1296P resolution front camera and waterproof rear camera, which clearly capture the road front and back. 3" super large IPS display screen can show the real-time image, help you see every details as clear as possible when playing back.

【Super Night Vision and Wide Angle】The dash cam front and rear with 6 pcs IR LED and Wide Dynamic Range, the dash cam with night vision offer crystal and clear video or picture quality by day and night thus ensuring to get you the best footage. Wide-angle front (170°) and rear（130°）camera help reduces the blind spots and captures more details.

【Loop Recording and G-Sensor】The dashcams for cars with card has highly-sensitive G-sensor. When the car takes collision, the dash cam will lock the current video to save evidence, it would not be deleted in loop recording mode. After the card is full, car camera dash cam will automatically overwrite the oldest videos(unlocked) to ensure the memory card has enough space to save the latest recordings and emergency videos.

【24 Hours Parking Monitor】This dash cam can protect your property when parking. If someone hits your car and impact reaches the G-Sensor Level, then the dash camera will turn ON and record 30s video, then LOCKS IT & SAVES IT. Please note that this function would not work on if you not use a hardwire kit (not included).

【32GB Card Include and Effortless Installation】 This dash cam for cars comes with a free 32GB card and easy to install and operate. The included suction mount could be easily attached anywhere on your windshield in seconds. The operation is simple and friendly for new users. Just plug in the SD card and connect to the power supply. Please format your SD card before recording. The car camera front and rear will start recording immediately after igniting.

【Customer Satisfaction Guarantee】Before use, please remove the protect paper cover the dashcam lens. We offer lifetime 7*24 hour technical support. This is by far the most powerful guarantee on the market. If you have any queries, please contact us on Amazon or the contact information in the instruction manual. The dashcams covers the functions what you need for daily driving. It's a decent gift for family and friend

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Newest Dash Cam 2023 UPGRADE DC200 1296P FHD - Captures extraordinary moments from your journey. Please use 32 GB micro memory card, class 10 or above. Please format the memory card on computer and on dash cam first before recording.Please press the OK button to stop the recording first, then press the MENU button to access the setting.The mini USB cable in package is for transferring video to your computer, which can not been used as power cord, please use the car charge to power this dashboard camera.If you want screen off but dash cam still keep recording, just choose" screensaver" in setting, dash cam will keep recording as normal.To avoid card full, we suggest: 1. turn off motion detection, 2. turn off G-sensor, 3. Turn on loop recording, 4. format card monthly. Specification: Screen : 3.0 inch LCD DisplayLens : 170° Wide Angle LensVideo Resolution : 1296P FHDStorage : Micro memory Card (up to 32 GB)External power supply : DC 5V /1.5APower port: Cigar lighter socket, (If your car do not have cigar lighter socket, you could install dash cam with hard wire kit)Operating temperature: -20°C～65°C

SPADE providing innovative and powerful dash camera, providing clear video, escorting your safety. 1 × 1296P FHD Dash Cam 1 × Waterproof Rear Camera 1 × 32GB Micro memory Card 1× Car Charger 1 x Suction cup 1× Installation Tool 1× Clean tool 1 x User Manual SPADE Full HD 1296P Dash Cam Front and Rear Constant Protection for Driving! The dashcam takes up tiny space in your car, which won't obstruct your vision while driving.It also comes with G-Sensor, parking monitor, motion detection and emergency collision detection, which could provide powerful evidence in case of dispute from a car accident.The dashcams covers the functions what you need for daily driving. It's a decent gift for family and friend. 2023 New Version-UPGRADE More Stable and Reliable Full Functions Ingenious Design Easy Install & Operate

BASIC FUNCTION 3 Inch Dash Camera With 3 inch LCD screen, all the image will be clearly captured in day and night with brilliant color. With a high-end video processor and 1296P Full HD resolution, it will provide a great performance with a smooth video recording, this dashcams for cars will provide you the best visual experience. Super Night Vision The car dash camera combination of f1.8 aperture and HDR technology makes night shots brighter and prevents overexposure. Eliminating the need for an auxiliary light source even in low-light environments, this dash-camera can obtain color-accurate images with ease and all the details. Two Mode of Dash Camera The dash camera for cars have two mode: Video and Photo. These modes also have menu to help you configure recording and taking photos, press Mode button to enter the mode you want. Watch the icon on top left corner of the screen for each mode .

PRACTICAL FUNCTIONS Dash Cam Front and Rear With 170° front and waterproof rear lens, the dash cam front and rear can provide you a more view, which eliminates the blind spots of your vision and provides greater security. You don't have to worry about the camera situation even in rainy or cloudy weather. Three display modes: front and rear, front only, rear only. G-Sensor The car dash cam with built-in adjustable G-Sensor, it's quickly captures an emergency and automatically locks the footage, preventing it from being overwritten, which ensures important footage is kept secure. Advanced WDR Technology The WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) technology allows the dash camera to capture more lights and balances the light and dark areas of the video automatically. Avoid high exposure in strong sunshine and take clear color-accurate video even in low-light environments.

Dash Cam Loop Recording In loop recording, the camera will record the video in 1/3/5 minutes clips. When the memory card is full, the camera will cover the earliest file with the latest one automatically. It is recommended to format the memory card once a month to avoid card full. (Locked video will not be covered) Parking Monitor Its used to protect your car after parking. With this function on, after the camera powering off. When camera detects shock and collision, it will automatically turn on and start recording video, then the lock video file safely. The parking Monitor mode provides your car with 24-hour protection. ( This function need use hardwire kit) Reversing Camera Mode This dash cameras display screen will automatically show full rear view with parking guide lines when the car reverse gear is engaged. The waterproof rear view camera will help you to park your car easily and safely. (If your car do NOT have built in reversing system display monitor,and you need dash cam reverse assistance function, the RED cable need connected to the positive pole of reversing lamp.)

Know Your SPADE DC200 Dashcam Front and Rear Recoder Better Based on your driving habits, you can freely choose the screen display mode: 1> Front camera display only 2> Backup dashcam display only 3> Front + Rear camera display (right corner) 4> Front + Rear camera display (1:1)

DC200 1296P Dash Cam DC600 4K Wi-Fi Dash Cam Camera Type Front + Rear Dash Cam Front + Rear Dash Cam Video Resolution 1296P+1080P 3840*2160P/2560*1440P+1080P Screen Size 3 inch LCD 3 inch LCD Wi-Fi(APP Control) ✓ GPS ✓ SD Card Included 32GB TF Card Included 64GB TF Card Included Power Interface DC 5V/1.5A~2A DC 5V/1.5A~2A

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Dash Cam Front and Rear, SPADE Dual Dash Camera 1080P with 32G SD Card, and I am extremely satisfied with its performance. This upgraded version exceeded my expectations in every way possible.First and foremost, the video quality is outstanding. Both the front and rear cameras capture crystal-clear footage at 1080P resolution, ensuring that every detail on the road is recorded accurately. The night vision capability is impressive as well, providing clear visibility even in low-light conditions. I feel confident knowing that the camera captures everything I need for evidence or review.The waterproof backup camera is a fantastic addition. It offers an extra layer of safety and convenience, allowing me to monitor what's happening behind my vehicle effortlessly. The image quality is remarkable, and it greatly assists me in parking and maneuvering in tight spaces.The DVR function is another standout feature. With loop recording, I never have to worry about running out of storage space on the included 32G SD card. The G-sensor technology ensures that any sudden impact or collision triggers an automatic lock on the recorded file, preventing it from being overwritten. This feature has provided me with peace of mind knowing that important footage is always protected.The parking monitor is a valuable asset as well. It keeps an eye on my parked vehicle and automatically starts recording if any motion or impact is detected. This added security measure gives me confidence when leaving my car unattended.Lastly, the overall build quality of the dash cam is exceptional. It feels sturdy and well-made, and the installation process was straightforward. The user-friendly interface and intuitive controls make it easy to navigate through the various settings and customize the camera to my preferences.In conclusion, I highly recommend the Dash Cam Front and Rear, SPADE Dual Dash Camera 1080P with 32G SD Card. Its impressive features, including the waterproof backup camera, DVR functionality, night vision, and parking monitor, make it an excellent investment for any driver. I couldn't be happier with my purchase and the peace of mind it provides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality dash cam at affordable price
reviews.reviewText: I went through all kinds of dash cams with different prices and landed on this one. It was easy to install it. I could hide the cable behind the inner cover around the windshield. The front camera is attached to the monitor and the suction cup is strong enogh to hold the monitor. Even on hot summer days, the monitor never came off. It came with long cable for the tiny cam for the back side. The cable was long enough to connect the hind cam to the monitor. I made a hole right above the tag and installed the camera without any trouble. I didn't even need to use the stickers that came with the camera. Even though the hind cam is installed outside, it is not easily noticeable as it is quite tiny.The video quality during daytime is better than I'd expected. Night vision is not impressive but to be fair, I think it's because of the glares from other cars' lights. You can change the views on the monitor like big front view with small hind view, 5:5 front and hind views, front view only or hind view only. The last hind view only is useful to me when I back up for parking since my car doesn't have native camera.After all, after using the dash cam for over two months, I will say this is a very good product. If you are sensitive about price but want a decent quality dash cam, this could be a good choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This dash cam is a great value for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This dash cam is a great value for the price. It's easy to use, records high-quality video and has a 24-hour parking monitoring feature that is essential for protecting your vehicle. I recently caught someone prowling around my car at night and the footage from the camera was crystal clear. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable and affordable dash cam. The only thing I wished this dash cam came with was a bigger SD card. So I recommend upgrading the SD card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ease to use
reviews.reviewText: It's easy to install. Clarity of images is decent enough. worth the price. The suction hold works well. Overall nice product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dash Cam for the Price
reviews.reviewText: After a lot of research and deciding on this dash cam for both of my vehicles, and after months using this dash-cam, here is my honest and fair review: If you’re looking for a quality economical, entry-level dash-cam, you will not go wrong with this one.1. The front camera has good resolution for its class. Not 4k, but it is higher than that of other brands at this price point. As long as you’re not looking for image quality of a $100-200 product, you should be satisfied as this item will provide sufficient evidence on the road. License plates are quite visible when cars are close enough and likely record it in an accident.2. I have used this in some hot weather. It seems to tolerate heat well, although it’s too early to tell. The quality of this product seems good.3. Customer service and warranty are top notch. Very responsive and helpful. They helped me when the rear cable was a little short for my long-bodied car.4. Everything you need is provided in the box. The 32Gb memory card is sufficient and I never had to re-format it after my initial format from the camera, although it is recommended to format it at least every month. I might upgrade it to a 64Gb or 128Gb card later.*Here’s a few additional tips:- Make sure you remove the adhesive taping on the front camera’s lens before installing. I made this mistake of not removing it and it was burry..- Make sure you clean the windshield front and back to get clear images. I thought the recordings were a little blur, but I found out it was my fault that my windshield had been dirty! Sometimes, the reflection from the dashboard to the glass causes glares too so keep that in mind.- When installing the suction cup, press it against the glass and turn the rotating dial to make it firmly stick. Mine never came off after my initial installation. Also, clean the surface before sticking the cup or cable clips!Hope this helps!

reviews.reviewTitle: Surprisingly good product for the price
reviews.reviewText: The product quality is very good for what I have paid. It works good even at evenings or nights. The installation is very easy, can be done within 10 minutes. I was first worried about the suction clamp, but it clamped very well on the windshield. My wife is very happy with the purchase. Overall, a recommended product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 5, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: Good camera at a low price
reviews.reviewText: This dashcam is easy to use and it takes good quality pictures and videos. I leave it in my vehicle plugged in; it automatically turns on when I start the car. I like that I can easily tilt the camera in the direction of suspected misconduct.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Good feature and quality in little price!
reviews.reviewText: I am contented with the purchase as this is front and rear cam with Sd memory , good quality , clear videos in dark ,enough high resolution for this price can easily read number plates in the videos.Easy to install , rear cam can be fixed with adhesive tape.Remember to clean the surface before installation.
Decent size of screen kinda hard to see far view, the charger part broke, and sticky part for back camera doesn’t last long to stick, easy to install
